title: 2/bd 1/ba, Vaulted ceilings, Oversized walk-in closets
posting_body: Verona Apartments offers the utmost in Henderson living with one, two, and three bedroom apartments.
You will enjoy the renovated redesigned interiors and life-enhancing upgrades around the property.
Wood-style plank flooring, spacious floor plans, and in-home laundry options are just a few apartment features you'll love.
